mapper.insert: insert into activities (created_at, log_key, log_type, log_action, user_login, data_field, log_message, profile_key) values (#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profileKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
